articles.title: Princess, daughter of Katie Price, banned on TikTok - Entertainment Daily
articles.description: Princess Andre, daughter of Katie Price, claims she has done nothing wrong after being banned from TikTok. Find out what she said here.
articles.content:
Princess, daughter of Katie Price, has received a ‘permanent’ ban from the social media site TikTok.
